# Webflow IC MVP → Code Components Translation

You are helping translate IC-created MVPs into Webflow Code Components.

## Your Task

When given a path to an IC MVP:

1. **Analyze the codebase** - Understand components, state, dependencies
2. **Create packages** - Core logic package (if needed) + app package
3. **Add Webflow wrappers** - `*.webflow.tsx` files with `declareComponent`
4. **Configure DevLink** - `webflow.json` for library sharing

## Package Pattern

```
packages/
├── [name]-core/              # Optional: Extract reusable logic
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── index.ts          # Public API exports
│   │   └── [modules]/        # Core functionality
│   ├── package.json
│   └── tsconfig.json
│
└── [name]/                   # Main package with React components
    ├── src/
    │   ├── components/
    │   │   ├── [Component].tsx           # React component
    │   │   └── [Component].webflow.tsx   # Webflow wrapper
    │   ├── App.tsx
    │   └── main.tsx
    ├── webflow.json          # DevLink configuration
    ├── package.json
    └── tsconfig.json
```

## Webflow Wrapper Pattern

```tsx
// [Component].webflow.tsx
import { declareComponent } from '@webflow/react';
import { props } from '@webflow/data-types';
import { MyComponent } from './MyComponent';

export default declareComponent(MyComponent, {
  name: 'My Component',
  description: 'What this component does',
  group: '[Category Name]',
  props: {
    // Expose props for Webflow Designer
    myProp: props.String({
      name: 'Display Name',
      defaultValue: 'default',
      tooltip: 'Help text for designers',
    }),
    variant: props.Variant({
      name: 'Variant',
      options: ['option1', 'option2'],
      defaultValue: 'option1',
    }),
    enabled: props.Boolean({
      name: 'Enabled',
      defaultValue: true,
    }),
    count: props.Number({
      name: 'Count',
      defaultValue: 0,
    }),
  },
});
```

## Prop Types Reference

| Type | Usage | Notes |
|------|-------|-------|
| `props.String()` | Text inputs | Most common |
| `props.Number()` | Numeric values | Integers or floats |
| `props.Boolean()` | Toggles | On/off states |
| `props.Variant()` | Select dropdowns | Define `options` array |
| `props.Slot()` | Child content | For nested elements |

## webflow.json Configuration

```json
{
  "name": "[Project Display Name]",
  "components": "./src/**/*.webflow.@(js|jsx|mjs|ts|tsx)",
  "library": {
    "name": "[Library Name]",
    "description": "[What this library provides]",
    "id": "[kebab-case-id]"
  }
}
```

## Designer Preview Mode

Components need to work in Webflow Designer without real data.
Create wrapper components with mock/preview props:

```tsx
// Real component expects complex object
interface RealProps {
  report: ComplexReport;
}

// Designer wrapper uses simple props
interface DesignerProps {
  itemCount: number;
  status: 'success' | 'error';
}

const DesignerComponent: React.FC<DesignerProps> = ({ itemCount, status }) => {
  // Build mock data from simple props
  const mockReport = createMockReport(itemCount, status);
  return <RealComponent report={mockReport} />;
};

// Export the designer-friendly version
export default declareComponent(DesignerComponent, { ... });
```

## Dependencies

Required for Code Components:
```json
{
  "dependencies": {
    "@webflow/react": "^1.0.0",
    "react": "^18.2.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@webflow/webflow-cli": "^1.0.0",
    "@webflow/data-types": "^1.0.0"
  }
}
```

## Scripts

Add to package.json:
```json
{
  "scripts": {
    "webflow:share": "npx webflow library share",
    "webflow:dev": "npx webflow devlink"
  }
}
```

## Checklist

Before considering translation complete:

- [ ] Core logic extracted (if reusable across packages)
- [ ] React components work standalone
- [ ] `*.webflow.tsx` wrappers created for key components
- [ ] Props exposed for Designer customization
- [ ] Designer preview mode works (mock data)
- [ ] `webflow.json` configured
- [ ] README documents the component library
- [ ] Committed and pushed to repo

## Reference

- [Webflow Code Components Docs](https://developers.webflow.com/code-components/introduction)
- [declareComponent API](https://developers.webflow.com/code-components/define-code-component)
- [Prop Types Reference](https://developers.webflow.com/code-components/reference/prop-types)
